org.resthub.identity.service.tracability

Interface TracableService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AclService, GroupService, RoleService, UserService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTraceableServiceImpl, AclServiceImpl, GroupServiceImpl, RoleServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl

    public interface TracableService
    This interface defines required stuff to allow third-party systems to track modifications on implementing classes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(ServiceListener listener)
      Adds a listener to this service.
      void removeListener(ServiceListener listener)
      Removes a listener from this service.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        void addListener(ServiceListener listener)
        Adds a listener to this service. Uneffective if the listener was already registered.
        Parameters:
        listener - The added listener.

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(ServiceListener listener)
        Removes a listener from this service. Uneffective if the listener was not registered.
        Parameters:
        listener - The added listener.
